title: Teaching Sociology - “Being Able to Listen Makes Me Feel More Engaged”: Best Practices for Using Podcasts as Readings
itunes:title: Teaching Sociology - “Being Able to Listen Makes Me Feel More Engaged”: Best Practices for Using Podcasts as Readings
description: Authors Jamie Oslawski-Lopez and Gregory Kordsmeier discuss their article, "'Being Able to Listen Makes Me Feel More Engaged': Best Practices for Using Podcasts as Readings," published in the October 2021 issue of Teaching Sociology.
content:encoded: Authors Jamie Oslawski-Lopez and Gregory Kordsmeier discuss their article, "'Being Able to Listen Makes Me Feel More Engaged': Best Practices for Using Podcasts as Readings," published in the October 2021 issue of Teaching Sociology.
